text: Patella variabilis is a species of sea snail, a true limpet, a marine gastropod mollusk in the family Patellidae, one of the families of true limpets. ==Subspecies== * Patella (Patella) variabilis f. concolor Krauss, C.F., 1848 Gastropods.com : f. concolor * Patella (Patella) variabilis f. constellata G.B. Sowerby I Gastropods.com : f. constellata * Patella (Patella) variabilis f. asciolata Tomlin, J.R. le B Gastropods.com : f. fasciolata * Patella (Patella) variabilis f. polygramma Tomlin, J.R. le B Gastropods.com : f. polygramma ==Description== ==Distribution== ==References== ==External links== * File:Patella variabilis concolor 002.jpg|Patella variabilis f. concolor, apical view File:Patella variabilis concolor 001.jpg|Patella variabilis f. concolor, ventral view File:Patella variabilis polygramma 001.jpg|Patella variabilis f. polygramma, ventral view Category:Patellidae Category:Gastropods described in 1848 Category:Taxa named by Christian Ferdinand Friedrich Krauss
title: Patella variabilis
